headline: Corning Inc (GLW) Q4 2024 Earnings Call Highlights: Record Revenue and Strong Profitability ...
summary: Corning Inc (GLW) reports an 18% revenue increase and a 46% EPS growth, driven by robust Optical Communications sales, despite challenges in Environmental Technologies.
